overview.en: The Next Generation On-Chain Battle SRPG Dapp power by the EOS blockchain. Upgrade your party and become the final hero at the Unlimited Tower.
overview.zh: 新一代 链上战略角色扮演游戏 Dapp 参与这场Unlimited Tower的自身团队竞赛, 成为最后的英雄。
overview.ko: 차세대 EOS On-Chain Battle SRPG Dapp. 자신만의 파티로 Unlimited Tower의 경쟁에 참여하세요.
